course_desc: Learn the fundamentals of the C programming language, including syntax, data types, and control structures.
A foundational guide exploring key algorithmic concepts, efficiency analysis, and problem-solving techniques for computer science and programming.
A primer on C++ programming with a focus on Data Structures and Algorithms, covering essential concepts for efficient coding.
Explore foundational data structures like arrays, linked lists, and stacks, fundamental for computer science and programming.
Learn object-oriented programming in Python, covering classes, objects, inheritance, and encapsulation for versatile software development.
An overview of principles, processes, and practices for building reliable, scalable, and maintainable software systems.
Explore Amazon Web Services and the fundamentals of cloud technology, enabling scalable, on-demand computing resources.
Learn the basics of MySQL, a popular relational database, covering data modeling, querying, and management concepts.
Develop problem-solving skills, strategies, and techniques essential for addressing complex issues across various domains.
